title: 512 MB hourly
info: 512 MB of Internet for 1 hour at the price of 12 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*512*1# to activate.

title: 1GB hourly
info: 1 GB of Internet for 1 hour at the price of 20 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*21*1# to activate.

title: 700 MB hourly
info: 700 MB of Internet for 1 hour at the price of 15 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*14*1# to activate.
